Title: Directs the department of taxation and finance to display on its website a list of municipalities which have instituted a taxpayers' bill of rights
Summary: Directs the department of taxation and finance to display on its website a list of municipalities which have instituted a taxpayers' bill of rights.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to directing the department of taxation and finance to display on its website a list of municipalities which have instituted a taxpayers' bill of rights
